abstract: Among all the companies clambering at the edges of the festival, the Microsoft search engine was the most successful in getting mentioned in online media, a study found.
snippet: Among all the companies clambering at the edges of the festival, the Microsoft search engine was the most successful in getting mentioned in online media, a study found.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — As the marketing world looks feverishly forward to the Super Bowl, some are still looking backward to the Sundance Film Festival, which ended on Sunday. Specifically: Which “ambush marketers” — Robert Redford’s term for the companies that clamber around the edges of his festival looking for buzz — were the most successful in getting some?

headline.main: At Sundance, Bing Led the Pack in Getting Noticed
